document_data.name: ''Hunting Shortbow''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Hunting shortbows''''' were a variety of simple [[enchanted]] [[bow]]s that were used against [[monstrosities]].
document_data.Description: ''Hunting shortbows'' were strong and thick [[ash]]-[[wood]] weapons.
document_data.Powers: These bows were imbued with a [[ranger]]'s magic that felt like a [[ghost]]'s wisp in the shooter's hands. The wielder of this shortbow could place a ''[[hunter's mark]]'' on a creature once per day. Additionally, the weapon made it easier to shoot a monstrosity, and it possessed a simple ''+1'' magic of guidance and damage boost.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Dammon]], a [[tiefling]] smith from the town of [[Elturel]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
